serviceRequestEncounterSearchParameter

Parameter code:reference

Searches for serviceRequest based on the serviceRequest encounter Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?encounter={uuid}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: serviceRequestEncounterSearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the serviceRequest encounter Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?encounter={uuid}
